title: Classic User Created Webhook Schema
description: Sent whenever a new user is created in SaaSquatch program where the classic program is enabled.

lastInitial.title: Last Initial
lastInitial.description: The initial of the user's last name

referralCode.title: Referral Code
referralCode.description: The referral code this user will share to refer others

imageUrl.title: Image Url
imageUrl.description: The URL to an image of this user

firstSeenIP.title: First Seen IP
firstSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were first seen by SaaSquatch

lastSeenIP.title: Last Seen IP
lastSeenIP.description: The IP address of this user when they were most recently seen by SaaSquatch

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: A timestamp of the date this user was created

emailHash.title: Email Hash
emailHash.description: An MD5 has of this user's email address

referralSource.title: Referral Source
referralSource.description: The source of the referral as defined by referral cookie (deprecated)

cookieId.title: Anonymous Cookie User Id
cookieId.description: The anonymous cookie user identifier associated with this user if applicable (see anonymous users)

paymentProviderId.title: Payment Provider Id
paymentProviderId.description: Unique user identifier for tenants using a v1 payment provider integration (e.g. Stripe/Recurly)

dateBlocked.title: Date Blocked
dateBlocked.description: The date the referral was blocked

classicShareLinks.title: Share Links
classicShareLinks.description: Links this user can share to make referrals

shareLink.title: Direct Share Link
shareLink.description: The share link tracked with DIRECT share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium

facebookShareLink.title: Facebook Share Link
facebookShareLink.description: The share link tracked with FACEBOOK share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium

twitterShareLink.title: Twitter Share Link
twitterShareLink.description: The share link tracked with TWITTER share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium

emailShareLink.title: Email Share Link
emailShareLink.description: The share link tracked with EMAIL share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium

linkedinShareLink.title: LinkedIn Share Link
linkedinShareLink.description: The share link tracked with LINKEDIN share medium and UNKNOWN engagement medium

mobileShareLink.title: Mobile Direct Share Link
mobileShareLink.description: The share link tracked with DIRECT share medium and MOBILE engagement medium

mobileFacebookShareLink.title: Mobile Facebook Share Link
mobileFacebookShareLink.description: The share link tracked with FACEBOOK share medium and MOBILE engagement medium

mobileTwitterShareLink.title: Mobile Twitter Share Link
mobileTwitterShareLink.description: The share link tracked with TWITTER share medium and MOBILE engagement medium

mobileEmailShareLink.title: Mobile Email Share Link
mobileEmailShareLink.description: The share link tracked with EMAIL share medium and MOBILE engagement medium

EMBED.title: Embedded Widget Share Links
EMBED.description: A list of share links associated with the EMBED engagement medium

POPUP.title: Popup Widget Share Links
POPUP.description: A list of share links associated with the POPUP engagement medium

HOSTED.title: Hosted Widget Share Links
HOSTED.description: A list of share links associated with the HOSTED engagement medium

MOBILE.title: Mobile Widget Share Links
MOBILE.description: A list of share links associated with the MOBILE engagement medium

EMAIL.title: Email Widget Share Links
EMAIL.description: A list of share links associated with the EMAIL engagement medium

shareLink.title: Direct Share Link
shareLink.description: The share link tracked with DIRECT share medium

facebookShareLink.title: Facebook Share Link
facebookShareLink.description: The share link tracked with FACEBOOK share medium

twitterShareLink.title: Twitter Share Link
twitterShareLink.description: The share link tracked with TWITTER share medium

emailShareLink.title: Email Share Link
emailShareLink.description: The share link tracked with EMAIL share medium

linkedinShareLink.title: LinkedIn Share Link
linkedinShareLink.description: The share link tracked with LINKEDIN share medium
